title: Reaction to Washington's Hearing, and Top 5 RBs and TEs
description:
Kevin, Ben, and Nora react to the news of today’s congressional hearing on the Washington Commanders and Roger Goodell’s testimony. They follow up by listing their top five running backs and tight ends going into the 2022-23 season.

Host: Kevin Clark, Ben Solak, and Nora Princiotti
Associate Producer: Stefan Anderson
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
